author: EXM7777
text:
here's what gurus don't tell you about hitting $10k/mo...

$10k per month is the first milestone for most people... and yeah, it changes your life, lets you live basically anywhere on the planet

but listen...

once you hit 10k/mo, it's surprisingly easy to just maintain it at that level

most of the work becomes maintenance... keeping customers happy

and this is where people get stuck

you fall into complacency... satisfied with the money, never pushing to actually scale

never making the move to the next level - you need to escape this phase immediately

having a revenue number as your only goal will leave you empty once you hit it

if you're chasing net worth (which is stupid btw), you have to move to the next target fast

don't let comfort kill your momentum
